workflow.name: Evaluate interview & update scores with Azure GPT-4o-mini and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## Description
Automatically score candidate questionnaire responses using Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), combine them with existing evaluations from Google Sheets, and keep your candidate database up to date‚Äîall in near real time. Get consistent, structured scores and key takeaways for faster, fairer decisions. ‚ö°üìä

**What This Template Does**

- Monitors new questionnaire submissions in Google Sheets every minute. ‚è±Ô∏è
- Evaluates responses with Azure OpenAI and returns structured JSON (score + takeaways). ü§ñ
- Parses model output safely and normalizes fields. üß©
- Retrieves existing candidate data from a central Google Sheet. üìÇ
- Calculates combined final scores and updates/append records by candidate name. ‚ûï

**Key Benefits**
- Consistent, objective scoring across all responses. üéØ
- Real-time processing from form submission to database update. üöÄ
- Clear JSON outputs for downstream reporting and analytics. üìà
- No-code customization of questions, weights, and fields. üõ†
- Scales effortlessly with high submission volumes. üì•

**Features**
- Continuous polling of the ‚ÄúBD Questionarie‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúForm Responses 1‚Äù sheet. üîÑ
- AI evaluation with GPT-4o-mini returning score (0‚Äì30) and takeaways. üß†
- Resilient JSON parsing (handles code fences and errors). üßº
- Candidate lookup in ‚ÄúResume store‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúSheet2‚Äù for data fusion. üîó
- Additive scoring model: Final Score = Existing Score + Questionnaire Score. ‚ûï
- Append or update records by name while preserving existing data. üìù

**Requirements**
- n8n instance (Cloud or self-hosted). üåê
- Google Sheets access:
- ‚ÄúBD Questionarie‚Äù spreadsheet (sheet: ‚ÄúForm Responses 1‚Äù) for new responses.
- ‚ÄúResume store‚Äù spreadsheet (sheet: ‚ÄúSheet2‚Äù) for existing profiles.
- Credentials configured in n8n (OAuth/Service Account) with read/write where needed. üîê
- Azure OpenAI access with a GPT-4o-mini deployment for evaluation and JSON output. ü§ñ
- Ability to customize evaluation questions and scoring weights within the workflow. ‚öôÔ∏è

**Target Audience**
- Teams evaluating candidate questionnaires and consolidating scores. üë•
- Operations teams centralizing hiring data in Google Sheets. üóÇÔ∏è
- Organizations seeking real-time, AI-assisted screening. üß≠
- No-code/low-code builders standardizing hiring workflows. üß±

**Step-by-Step Setup Instructions **

- Connect Google Sheets in n8n Credentials; grant access to ‚ÄúBD Questionarie‚Äù and ‚ÄúResume store.‚Äù üîë
- Add Azure OpenAI credentials in n8n; ensure a GPT-4o-mini deployment is available. ü§ù
- Import the workflow, assign credentials to each node, and set the sheet IDs/ranges. üìã
- Confirm name is the matching key, and adjust evaluation weights or questions as needed. ‚öñ
- Run once to validate parsing and score calculation, then enable polling (every minute). ‚ñ∂Ô∏è

parameters.text:
=Role:
Questions and Candidate Answers:
Q1: What is Business development according to you
A1: {{ $json["What is BD according to you?"] }}
Q2: What is SWOT analysis
A2: {{ $json["What is SWOT analysis"] }}

Please evaluate the above responses based on knowledge depth, problem-solving ability, and communication clarity.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI evaluator for candidate screening. 
You will be given:
- A set of role-specific questions.
- A candidate's answers.

Your job:
1. Evaluate the quality of the answers against the intent of each question.
2. Score the questionnaire (0‚Äì30 by default, or adjust scale if specified).
3. Provide key takeaways (strengths, weaknesses, red flags, or standout qualities).

Output ONLY in JSON with this structure:
{
  "questionnaire_score": <number>,
  "key_takeaways": "<summary of candidate performance>"
}

parameters.content:
## üîî AUTOMATIC TRIGGER

**Monitor New Questionnaire Responses**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Automatically detects when candidates submit questionnaire forms
‚Ä¢ **Monitoring**: Polls Google Sheets every minute for new responses
‚Ä¢ **Source**: 'BD Questionarie' spreadsheet, 'Form Responses 1' sheet
‚Ä¢ **Trigger**: Activates immediately when new form submission is detected
‚Ä¢ **Reliability**: Continuous monitoring ensures no responses are missed
‚Ä¢ **Real-time Processing**: Enables immediate evaluation of candidate submissions

## ü§ñ AI EVALUATION ENGINE

**AI Questionnaire Evaluator**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Intelligently analyzes candidate responses to role-specific questions
‚Ä¢ **Evaluation Criteria**:
  - Knowledge depth and accuracy
  - Problem-solving ability
  - Communication clarity and structure
‚Ä¢ **Scoring**: 0-30 points for questionnaire performance
‚Ä¢ **Questions Analyzed**:
  - Business Development concepts
  - SWOT analysis understanding
‚Ä¢ **Output**: JSON with score and detailed key takeaways

## ‚öôÔ∏è AI MODEL CONFIGURATION

**Azure OpenAI GPT-4 Model**

‚Ä¢ **Model**: GPT-4o-mini for efficient evaluation
‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Powers the questionnaire analysis engine
‚Ä¢ **Capabilities**: 
  - Natural language understanding
  - Structured JSON output
  - Business domain knowledge
‚Ä¢ **Connection**: Azure OpenAI service integration
‚Ä¢ **Performance**: Optimized for consistent evaluation quality

## üîß DATA PROCESSING

**Parse AI Evaluation Results**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Converts AI text output into structured JSON format
‚Ä¢ **Process**: 
  - Removes markdown code fences (```json)
  - Parses JSON structure safely
  - Handles parsing errors gracefully
‚Ä¢ **Output**: Clean JSON object with questionnaire_score and key_takeaways
‚Ä¢ **Error Handling**: Returns error details if JSON parsing fails
‚Ä¢ **Data Quality**: Ensures consistent data structure for downstream processing

## üìä DATA RETRIEVAL

**Lookup Candidate Profile Data**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Retrieves existing candidate information from central database
‚Ä¢ **Source**: 'Resume store' spreadsheet, Sheet2
‚Ä¢ **Data Retrieved**: 
  - Current evaluation scores
  - Candidate profile information
  - Previous assessment results
‚Ä¢ **Matching**: Links questionnaire responses to existing candidate records
‚Ä¢ **Integration**: Enables combining multiple evaluation sources

## üßÆ SCORE CALCULATION

**Calculate Combined Scores**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Combines questionnaire score with existing evaluation score
‚Ä¢ **Calculations**:
  - **Final Score**: Existing Score + Questionnaire Score
  - **Questionnaire Score**: Extracted from AI evaluation (0-30)
‚Ä¢ **Data Fields Created**:
  - 'final score': Combined total score
  - 'Questionarie Score': Individual questionnaire performance
‚Ä¢ **Scoring Logic**: Additive scoring model for comprehensive evaluation

## üíæ DATABASE UPDATE

**Update Candidate Database**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Saves questionnaire results and updated scores to candidate database
‚Ä¢ **Update Method**: Append or update existing records using name matching
‚Ä¢ **Data Stored**:
  - Questionnaire Score (0-30 points)
  - Final Score (combined evaluation)
  - Maintains all existing candidate data
‚Ä¢ **Matching Key**: Uses candidate name for record identification
‚Ä¢ **Database Integrity**: Preserves existing candidate information while adding new scores

## üìù CANDIDATE QUESTIONNAIRE ANALYSIS WORKFLOW

**üéØ Purpose:** Automatically evaluates candidate questionnaire responses and integrates scores with existing evaluations for comprehensive assessment

**üîÑ Automated Process Flow:**
1. **Real-time Monitoring**: Continuously watches for new questionnaire submissions
2. **AI Analysis**: Evaluates responses using advanced language models
3. **Score Processing**: Parses and validates evaluation results
4. **Data Integration**: Combines questionnaire scores with existing candidate data
5. **Score Calculation**: Creates comprehensive final scores
6. **Database Update**: Maintains centralized candidate evaluation records

**üìä Evaluation Framework:**
‚Ä¢ **Questionnaire Score**: 0-30 points based on:
  - Knowledge depth and accuracy
  - Problem-solving approach
  - Communication clarity
‚Ä¢ **Final Score**: Combined evaluation (Resume + Questionnaire)

**üèóÔ∏è System Integration:**
‚Ä¢ **Google Forms**: Questionnaire collection
‚Ä¢ **Google Sheets**: Data storage and monitoring
‚Ä¢ **Azure OpenAI**: Intelligent evaluation engine
‚Ä¢ **Automated Processing**: Real-time response handling

**‚ú® Key Benefits:**
‚Ä¢ **Immediate Processing**: No delay between submission and evaluation
‚Ä¢ **Objective Analysis**: AI-powered consistent evaluation criteria
‚Ä¢ **Comprehensive Scoring**: Combines multiple assessment sources
‚Ä¢ **Scalable Solution**: Handles high volume of questionnaire responses
‚Ä¢ **Quality Insights**: Detailed takeaways for each candidate evaluation

## ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURATION & CUSTOMIZATION

**üîß Questionnaire Questions (Customizable):**
‚Ä¢ **Current Questions**:
  - "What is Business Development according to you?"
  - "What is SWOT analysis?"
‚Ä¢ **Question Types**: Role-specific knowledge assessment
‚Ä¢ **Scoring Range**: 0-30 points per questionnaire

**üìä Scoring Configuration:**
‚Ä¢ **Questionnaire Weight**: 30 points maximum
‚Ä¢ **Combined Scoring**: Additive model (Resume + Questionnaire)
‚Ä¢ **Evaluation Criteria**:
  - Knowledge depth (40%)
  - Problem-solving ability (30%) 
  - Communication clarity (30%)

**üîÑ Monitoring Settings:**
‚Ä¢ **Poll Frequency**: Every minute
‚Ä¢ **Response Source**: Google Forms ‚Üí Google Sheets
‚Ä¢ **Processing**: Real-time evaluation and scoring

**üìù Maintenance Tasks:**
‚Ä¢ Update questions based on role requirements
‚Ä¢ Review AI evaluation criteria quarterly
‚Ä¢ Monitor response processing accuracy
‚Ä¢ Backup questionnaire data regularly

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.
